0: The evening buffet was to die for but if you have not been to Singapore before you might think it is s little expensive
Needed to queue shortly to be seated for breakfast as there were not enough seats
Did nt get chance to try the hors doeuvres though but the lounge is lovely
The breakfast room is on an elevated area on the ground floor adjacent to reception
The breakfast afternoon tea canape spread provided in the club lounge while not extensive is of good quality

We booked breakfast which was plentiful but a word of warning for UK vistors obviously this hotel is aimed at the Asian market so tables are very close together and I mean close also the although the hotel does try and accommodate British tastes the food is mainly Asian
The drinks in the bar where very expensive to much 450 for 2 beers
We usually avoid the buffet at all cost but this one was great
The breakfast buffet was not great though
1: Only a few minutes walk to the bus stop and there is a shortcut through the hotel into the shopping centre which has a supermarket and a few restaurants
Fabulous rooms great lobby amazing complimentary breakfast buffet good concierge service all in a great location
Breakfast is great and the location is very convenience
Many shops malls and restaurants within walking distance and Metro station within 10 minutes walk
A large lobby with a coffee lounge bar and restaurant welcome you with direct under cover access to a small shopping area
a good spread for breakfast and very prompt service
The buffet breakfast is wonderful and the service staff could not have been more attentive to our comfort after a 21 hour flight
It was walking distance to all the malls grocery stores and restaurants
